pages.text: Tamen de caichan he zisi, buyao shi ni zantan, an la zhiyao zai jinshi shenghuo zhong jie ci chengzhi tamen, er tamen de linghun jiang zai bu xindao de qingkuang xia li qu
Tamen yi an la mengshi, shuo tamen dique shi nimen de tongdao; qishi tamen bushi nimen de tongdao, dan tamen shi danqie de minzhong
Jiaruo tamen faxian yige baolei, huo shandong, huo didao, tamen biding canghuang de taocuan
Tamen zhong youren tiaoti ni fenpei zhen kuan de gongzuo. Ruguo fen gei tamen yi fen, tamen jiu xihuan; ruguo bu fen gei tamen, tamen jiu boran da nu
Ruguo tamen manyi an la ji qi shizhe jiyu tamen de, bing shuo:“An la ji qi shizhe jiang yi bie de enhui jiyu nimen, women que shi qiqiu an la de.”(Na duiyu tamen shi geng youyi de)

Zhen kuan zhi guiyu pinqiong zhe, chipin zhe, guanli zhen wu zhe, xin bei tuanjie zhe, wuli shushen zhe, buneng huanzhai zhe, wei zhu dao gongzuo zhe, tuzhong qiongkun zhe; zhe shi an la de dingzhi. An la shi quanzhi de, shi zhi rui de

Tamen zhong youren shanghai xianzhi, cheng ta wei erduo, ni shuo:“Ta duiyu nimen shi hao erduo, ta xinyang an la, xinren xinshimen, ta shi nimen zhong xindao zhe de ci'en.” Shanghai shizhe de renmen, jiang shou tongku de xingfa
